trans-unit.source: Represents an association between a source <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" />, and a target object which can be a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un'associazione tra un oggetto di origine, <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> e un oggetto target, che può essere un oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> o una risorsa esterna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> defines an association between a *source* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a *target* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> definisce un'associazione tra un *origine* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> per un *destinazione* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> o una risorsa esterna.

trans-unit.source: The source object is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto di origine è considerato il "proprietario" della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> class has no public constructor; instead, two Create methods are used:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> classe non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico; in alternativa, in cui vengono utilizzati due metodi di creazione:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a "package-level" relationship—from a package to a specified part or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Crea una relazione di "livello di pacchetto", ovvero da un pacchetto a una parte specificata o una risorsa esterna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a "part-level" relationship—from one part to another part or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Crea una relazione "a livello di parte", da una parte di un'altra parte o una risorsa esterna.

trans-unit.source: The source package or part is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto di origine o di parte è identificato dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> la proprietà della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The target part or external resource is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: La parte di destinazione o una risorsa esterna è identificata dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> la proprietà della relazione.

trans-unit.source: Creating or deleting a relationship does not affect the source or target objects in any way.
trans-unit.target: La creazione o eliminazione di una relazione non influenza gli oggetti di origine o di destinazione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: If a source object is deleted, all relationships owned by the object are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: Se viene eliminato un oggetto di origine, vengono eliminate anche tutte le relazioni di proprietà dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Relationships enable navigation both in a document and between documents.
trans-unit.target: Le relazioni consentono lo spostamento in un documento e tra i documenti.

trans-unit.source: Relationships also support document object model services, such as linking a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> to specific document elements when printing.
trans-unit.target: Le relazioni supportano anche i servizi modelli a oggetti documento, ad esempio un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> per elementi specifici del documento durante la stampa.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> elements see Section 1.3 "Relationships" in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> elementi, vedere la sezione 1.3 "Relazioni" nel *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa mediante cui si identifica la relazione.

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Stringa mediante cui si identifica la relazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> property string is unique for all relationships owned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> package or part.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> proprietà stringa è univoca per tutte le relazioni di proprietà di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> pacchetto o in parte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> viene specificato nella chiamata ai **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: metodo che ha creato la relazione.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione, il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> property string is a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> stringa della proprietà è un identificatore XML valido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> tipo è xsd: ID e deve seguire le convenzioni di denominazione previste nel *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specifica (vedere [ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: The package that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Package che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elements see the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elementi vedere il *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del tipo qualificato della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Nome del tipo qualificato della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> viene specificato nella chiamata ai **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: metodo che ha creato la relazione.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione, il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> is defined in a URI-like syntax and identifies the role of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> è definito in una sintassi URI e identifica il ruolo della relazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifies the relationship to a target part that is a "required-resource."
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifica la relazione a una parte di destinazione che è un "required-resource."

trans-unit.source: **Package-Wide Relationship Types**
trans-unit.target: **Tipi di relazione a livello di pacchetto**

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrizione

trans-unit.source: Relationship Type
trans-unit.target: Tipo di relazione

trans-unit.source: Core Properties
trans-unit.target: Proprietà principali

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature
trans-unit.target: Firma digitale

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature Certificate
trans-unit.target: Certificato di firma digitale

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature Origin
trans-unit.target: Origine della firma digitale

trans-unit.source: Thumbnail
trans-unit.target: Immagine di anteprima

trans-unit.source: For more information about package relationship types see Chapter 3 and Appendix I of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla relazione di pacchetto tipi vedere il capitolo 3 e appendice I del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package or part that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del pacchetto o della parte proprietari della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> proprietari della relazione.

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> returns a URI of "/".
trans-unit.target: Se la relazione appartiene a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> restituisce un URI di "/".

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> returns the URI of the part.
trans-unit.target: Se la relazione appartiene a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> restituisce l'URI della parte.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the target of the relationship is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> to the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la destinazione della relazione è <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that indicates whether <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri" /> references a resource <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> to the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di enumerazione che indica se <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri" /> fa riferimento a una risorsa <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> viene specificato nella chiamata ai **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: metodo che ha creato la relazione.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> deve essere un riferimento relativo.

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Per una relazione a livello di pacchetto, il riferimento relativo del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> viene risolto relativo URI di tipo pack del pacchetto di origine che è proprietario e contiene la relazione.

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (Esempio origine pacchetto URI di tipo pack: "pack://http:, www.adatum.com, www.adatum.com,Files,datapak.package/".) Per una relazione a livello di parte, il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> viene risolto rispetto alla parte di origine a cui appartiene la relazione (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> è interpretato rispetto a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> può essere un URI completo o un riferimento relativo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> è un riferimento relativo, il riferimento è interpretato rispetto alla posizione del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> , vedere la sezione 1.3.3 "Relazione Markup" del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa di destinazione della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> viene specificato nella chiamata ai **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: metodo che ha creato la relazione.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> deve essere un riferimento relativo.

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Per una relazione a livello di pacchetto, il riferimento relativo del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> viene risolto relativo URI di tipo pack del pacchetto di origine che è proprietario e contiene la relazione.

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (Esempio origine pacchetto URI di tipo pack: "pack://http:, www.adatum.com, www.adatum.com,Files,datapak.package/".) Per una relazione a livello di parte, il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> viene risolto rispetto alla parte di origine a cui appartiene la relazione (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> è interpretato rispetto a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> può essere un URI completo o un riferimento relativo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> è un riferimento relativo, il riferimento è interpretato rispetto alla posizione del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> , vedere la sezione 1.3.3 "Relazione Markup" del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
